name: GKGraph
desc: A collection of nodes that describes the navigability of a game world and provides pathfinding methods to search for routes through that space.

items.name: init([GKGraphNode])
items.desc: Initializes a graph with the specified list of nodes.

items.name: func add([GKGraphNode])
items.desc: Adds the specified nodes to the graph.

items.name: func connectToLowestCostNode(node: GKGraphNode, bidirectional: Bool)
items.desc: Adds a node to the graph, connecting it to the node already in the graph for which the connection has the lowest cost.

items.name: func remove([GKGraphNode])
items.desc: Removes the specified nodes from the graph.

items.name: var nodes: [GKGraphNode]?
items.desc: The list of nodes in the graph.

items.name: func findPath(from: GKGraphNode, to: GKGraphNode) -> [GKGraphNode]
items.desc: Computes and returns a sequence of nodes that represents the shortest traversal of the graph between the specified nodes.
